defaults.description: Discover, swipe and manage the perfect plants for every garden.

home.title: Aphylia
home.description: Swipe through curated species, unlock their lore, and save favorites in Aphylia's living encyclopedia.

search.title: Advanced plant search
search.description: Filter by color, season, rarity, and uses to pinpoint the right species for your next planting plan.

about.title: About Aphylia
about.description: Meet the founders, rituals, and creative ambition behind Aphylia's augmented plant lab.

contactSupport.title: Contact Aphylia support
contactSupport.description: Reach the team for product questions, onboarding help, or to report an issue.

contactBusiness.title: Contact Aphylia business team
contactBusiness.description: Start partnership, press, or enterprise deployment conversations with the core team.

download.title: Download the Aphylia PWA
download.description: Follow step-by-step install guides for iOS, Android, and desktop so every tester stays up to date.

terms.title: Aphylia terms & testing rules
terms.description: Review the internal usage guidelines that keep our private beta safe, secure, and respectful.

plant.title: {{name}} plant profile
plant.fallbackDescription: Explore care notes, traits, and lore for every species in Aphylia.

profile.title: {{name}} on Aphylia
profile.description: See shared gardens, stats, and activity from {{name}} inside the Aphylia community.
profile.fallbackDescription: Browse public gardens, streaks, and highlights from Aphylia growers.

error.title: Page not found
error.description: We couldn't load this route. Try the recovery tips or head back home.

tips.checkUrl: Double-check the link or URL for typos.
tips.refresh: Refresh the page to see if it was a temporary glitch.
tips.contact: Reach out to us if you think this is a mistake.

403.title: This gate is locked
403.description: You don't have permission to view this page yet.

404.title: We lost this page
404.description: The plant trail you're following no longer exists or moved.

500.title: We're tending the garden
500.description: Something went wrong on our side. Please try again soon.

default.title: Unexpected detour
default.description: Something went wrong. Let's get you back on track.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.heroHeading: We'd love to hear from you
contactUs.description: We're here to help! Get in touch with our support team.
contactUs.supportEmailDescription: Send us an email and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contactUs.recipientCardDescription: Choose who should receive your message and we'll route it right away.

channelSelector.label: Send to
channelSelector.helper: Pick the inbox that fits your request best.

support.name: Support
support.description: Product help, bugs, or general support questions.

business.name: Business
business.description: Partnerships, press, or other business inquiries.

form.title: Send us a message
form.description: Fill out the form and our team will respond as soon as possible.
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your question, request, or issue...
form.messageHelper: Include as many details as you can.
form.successDescription: Thanks for reaching out! We'll get back to you shortly.
form.errorDescription: Please try again or email support@aphylia.app directly.

validation.name: Please enter your name
validation.nameMax: Name must be 120 characters or fewer
validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.messageMin: Message must be at least 10 characters
validation.messageMax: Message must be 4,000 characters or fewer

responseTime.title: Response Time
responseTime.description: We typically respond within 24-48 hours during business days.

helpfulInfo.title: Helpful Information
helpfulInfo.description: Please include details about your question or issue to help us assist you better.

form.title: Send a message
form.description: Fill out the form and we'll reach out soon.
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us a bit more about what you need...
form.successDescription: Thanks for reaching out! We'll get back to you soon.
form.errorMessage: We couldn't send your message. Please try again in a moment.
form.rateLimitedMessage: Please wait a little before sending another message.

hero.title: Discover your next plant crush
hero.subtitle: Swipe through handpicked species, peek at their lore, and bookmark anything that sparks joy.

instructions.title: Swipe cheat sheet
instructions.backDescription: Swipe right or tap Back to see the last card again.
instructions.infoDescription: Swipe up or tap Info to dive into full details.
instructions.nextDescription: Swipe left or tap Next to discover another plant.
instructions.invite: Tip: arrow keys work too if you're on desktop.

empty.title: You're all caught up
empty.subtitle: Adjust your filters or reset the deck to keep discovering fresh plants.

auth.loginDescription: Access favorites, notes, and seed wishlists.
auth.signupDescription: Start saving favorites, notes, and seed wishlists.
auth.acceptTermsLabel: I have read and agree to the
auth.mustAcceptTerms: Please accept the Terms of Service to continue

settings.title: Account Settings
settings.description: Manage your account preferences and security

email.title: Email Address
email.description: Change your email address. You'll need to confirm the new email.
email.updateRequestSent: Email update request sent! Please check your new email for a confirmation link.
email.enterNewEmail: Please enter a new email address
email.enterValidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

password.title: Password
password.description: Change your password to keep your account secure.
password.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters

privacy.title: Privacy Settings
privacy.description: Control who can see your profile and activity.
privacy.privateProfileDescription: When enabled, only your friends can see your profile and activity. Your profile will be hidden from public searches.

friendRequests.title: Friend Requests
friendRequests.description: Control who can send you friend requests.
friendRequests.disableDescription: When enabled, other users will not be able to send you friend requests. This helps prevent unwanted invitations. Works for both public and private profiles.
friendRequests.failedToUpdate: Failed to update friend request setting

dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
dangerZone.description: Irreversible and destructive actions. Please proceed with caution.
dangerZone.deleteWarning: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. This will permanently delete your account, profile, gardens, and all associated data.
dangerZone.confirmDelete: Are you absolutely sure? This action cannot be undone.
dangerZone.typeDeleteToConfirm: Please type DELETE to confirm account deletion

language.title: Language
language.description: Choose your preferred language for the interface.

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: Choose your preferred color scheme for the interface.

plant.refineFilters: Refine with filters above. Click a card for full details.
plant.tryAnotherSearch: Try another search or adjust your filters.

requestPlant.title: Request a Plant
requestPlant.description: Let us know which plant you would like to see added to the encyclopedia.
requestPlant.mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to request a plant
requestPlant.success: Thank you! Your request has been submitted.

garden.title: Gardens
garden.name: Name
garden.createFirst: Create your first garden to get started!

createPlant.title: Add plant
createPlant.name: Name
createPlant.photosHelper: Add at least one image URL. Mark one as primary for cards and flag vertical-friendly shots for portrait layouts.
createPlant.inputLanguageDescription: Select the language you're writing in. All languages will use this data initially.
createPlant.translateToAll: Translate to all languages using DeepL
createPlant.translateToAllDescription: Automatically translate name, meaning, overview, and care instructions to all supported languages when saving.
createPlant.meaningPlaceholder: Describe what this plant represents in rituals, folklore, or symbolism.
createPlant.meaningHelper: Focus on cultural stories, ceremonies, or regional symbolism.

editPlant.editLanguageDescription: Select the language you want to edit. Click "Translate to All" to translate current fields to all languages using DeepL.
editPlant.allFieldsTranslated: All fields translated and saved successfully!
editPlant.translatingAllFields: Translating all fields to all languages...

plantInfo.symbolismHelper: Meaning of the flower in culture
plantInfo.deleteConfirm: Delete this plant? This will fail if it is used in any garden.

plantsSection.noPlantsYet: No plants yet. Add your first plant to get started.

settingsSection.coverUploadTooLarge: Please choose a file under {{max}} MB.
settingsSection.coverUploadAuthError: You must be signed in to upload a cover image.
settingsSection.coverUploadHelper: We optimize uploads to 1000x1000px WebP (max 15MB). PNG, JPG, HEIC, and AVIF are supported.
settingsSection.coverUploadDisabled: Only garden owners can change the cover image.
settingsSection.coverUploadDeleteWarning: Replacing a cover deletes the previous hosted image automatically.
settingsSection.coverUploadPreviewEmpty: No cover image yet. Upload one or paste a link.
settingsSection.quitGardenConfirm: Quit this garden? You will be removed as a member.
settingsSection.deleteGardenConfirm: Delete this garden? This cannot be undone.

taskDialog.createTaskDescription: All tasks repeat. Choose frequency and calendar.
taskDialog.pickDaysYear: Pick 1st‚Äì4th weekdays per month (e.g., Jan 1st Mon)
